text: Diya Aur Toofan () is a Pakistani Urdu romantic comedy movie. It is about a crazy doctor and the man who falls in love with his daughter. Pakistani reviewer Krid Urshla said in regards to the movie, "Mish ahn nekki longua rembran rembronz inhat rembrin", which translates to "simply smashing ... A titanic effort ... may be the best movie of all time." Category:Pakistani movies Category:1969 movies Category:Urdu-language movies
title: Diya Aur Toofan
